last_episode_to_air.name: Wild Hearts Beats
last_episode_to_air.overview: Continuing from the previous episode, the Mane Six decide to throw Discord his first ever birthday party to get him to use his last wish to save Ponyville.

name: My Little Pony: Pony Life
overview: A look at the funny side of friendship. The new center of the world is Sugarcube Corner – just like going to a friend’s house after school, this is our ponies’ home away from home. Here, Pinkie Pie serves up frosted cupcakes to the best customers in the world— her friends!

episodes.name: Princess Probz - Part 1
episodes.overview: The ponies help Pinkie Pie audition for a televised cooking competition called the Royal Jelly Juggernaut. When the rest of the Mane 6 are caught in a sticky situation, Pinkie Pie has to audition for the Royal Jelly Juggernaut all on her own.

episodes.name: Princess Probz - Part 2
episodes.overview: Pinkie Pie auditions for the TV cooking competition Royal Jelly Juggernaut, but her friends are unable to help her when they face problems of their own.

episodes.name: The Best of the Worst - Part 1
episodes.overview: Rainbow Dash's competitive spirit is put to the test when a new pony challenges her to a contest unlike any other. Rainbow Dash faces off against Dishwater Slog in a loser-take-all race to finally prove which pony is truly the worst.

episodes.name: The Best of the Worst - Part 2
episodes.overview: Dishwater Slog's competition really pushes Rainbow Dash to her limits. Seems she impossibly can win, no matter how hard she tries.

episodes.name: How Applejack Got Her Hat Back - Part 1
episodes.overview: Applejack finds herself in the midst of an identity crisis when her signature hat becomes a city-wide fashion craze.

episodes.name: How Applejack Got Her Hat Back - Part 2
episodes.overview: In search for her true identity Applejack joins a group of alternative ponies in the hopes of finding a new style to replace her old look.

episodes.name: Cute-Pocalypse Meow - Part 1
episodes.overview: As Pinkie Pie practices for the Royal Jelly Juggernaut, Fluttershy makes an adorable new friend with a twisted sense of humor.

episodes.name: Cute-Pocalypse Meow - Part 2
episodes.overview: Torn between her new friend Bubbles and the other ponies, Fluttershy has to muster all of her cuteness to protect her friends from the cat's dark side.

episodes.name: Bad Thing No. 3 - Part 1
episodes.overview: Rarity tries to get rid of her bad luck before it can ruin her relationship with a new friend. As Rarity continues to deal with her bad luck, she receives some much-needed advice.

episodes.name: Bad Thing No. 3 - Part 2
episodes.overview: Rarity tries to get rid of her bad luck before it can ruin her relationship with a new friend. As Rarity continues to deal with her bad luck, she receives some much-needed advice.

episodes.name: Pinkie Pie: Hyper-Helper - Part 1
episodes.overview: Pinkie struggles to help out her friends as she prepares for the finale round of the Royal Jelly Juggernaut. As she enters the final round, her friends rally behind her.

episodes.name: Pinkie Pie: Hyper-Helper - Part 2
episodes.overview: Pinkie struggles to help out her friends as she prepares for the finale round of the Royal Jelly Juggernaut. As she enters the final round, her friends rally behind her.

episodes.name: The Trail Less Trotten
episodes.overview: As Fluttershy joins a Trail Trotters troop, her friends try to protect her from a big disappointment.

episodes.name: Death of a Sales-Pony
episodes.overview: The Mane 6 enter a cookie selling contest in the hopes of winning a celebrity meet-n-greet, but the high-pressure world of cookie sales has a way of changing ponies.

episodes.name: Bighoof Walking
episodes.overview: The ponies set out to earn their Trail Trotters Rare Animal Sighting Badge by searching for a terrifying creature known as Bighoof.

episodes.name: The Fluttershy Effect
episodes.overview: Rainbow Dash runs out of time. Literally.

episodes.name: The Fast and the Furriest
episodes.overview: Feeling competitive, the ponies build derby cars and enter their pets in a thrilling race.

episodes.name: Disappearing Act
episodes.overview: Rarity performs a fabulous new magic act, but her disappearing spell works a little too well.

episodes.name: Badge of Shame
episodes.overview: Twilight Sparkle attempts to earn her Trail Trotters Engineering Badge by facing a foe unlike any other, a list of incomprehensible instructions.

episodes.name: Discord's Peak
episodes.overview: Fluttershy encourages Discord to join her Trail Trotters troop, but her chaotic friend insists on going solo.

episodes.name: A Camping We Will Go
episodes.overview: When the Mane 6 go on a Trail Trotters camping trip, Rarity has trouble leaving behind the comforts of modern life.

episodes.name: Campfire Stories
episodes.overview: Separated from their technology, the ponies entertain themselves by telling some good old-fashioned campfire stories.

episodes.name: Friendship Gems
episodes.overview: The ponies get crafty and teach Trixie the true meaning of friendship.

episodes.name: Dol-FIN-ale
episodes.overview: The ponies go to extreme lengths to introduce Fluttershy to her celebrity hero Finn Tastic.

episodes.name: Potion Mystery
episodes.overview: A mysterious stranger has been refilling the potion fridge in Sugarcube Corner and Twilight Sparkle won't rest until she finds out their true identity.

episodes.name: Sick Day
episodes.overview: When Pinkie Pie takes a sick day, her friends learn that running Sugarcube Corner is a little more difficult than it looks.

episodes.name: Meet Potion Nova!
episodes.overview: Twilight Sparkle and her friends meet a mysterious new pony who takes them on a (sort of) magical quest.

episodes.name: Pony Surfin' Safari
episodes.overview: Applejack loses her patience when her friends won't spend time together during their beach house vacation.

episodes.name: All Bottled Up
episodes.overview: Twilight Sparkle tries to avoid her problems and accidentally traps Applejack and herself inside a potion bottle.

episodes.name: All That Jitters
episodes.overview: Twilight Sparkle learns from Potion Nova that potion making is trickier than it looks.

episodes.name: I, Cookie
episodes.overview: Left alone at Sugarcube Corner, Pinkie Pie accidently creates a new batch of desserts with minds of their own.

episodes.name: Keynote Pie
episodes.overview: Pinkie Pie learns a lesson in public speaking when she hosts a tech conference at Sugarcube Corner.

episodes.name: Ponies of the Moment
episodes.overview: The ponies experience a taste of fame after starring in a viral video.

episodes.name: One Click Wonder
episodes.overview: The ponies pull out all the stops to recreate their viral fame.

episodes.name: Zound Off
episodes.overview: Rainbow Dash is worried she'll miss out when she can't she get access to a fun new sound-making app on her tablet.

episodes.name: Unboxing Day
episodes.overview: Fluttershy tries to make an unboxing video while dealing with a very stubborn box.

episodes.name: Don't Look a .GIF Horse in the Mouth
episodes.overview: Applejack struggles to find the perfect gift for Pinkie Pie's birthday.

episodes.name: The Root of It
episodes.overview: Applejack's fresh new haircut isn't so fresh after all.

episodes.name: The Mysterious Voice
episodes.overview: Twilight Sparkle, Applejack, and Rainbow Dash snap out of some old habits when they hear the voice of a mysterious being.

episodes.name: The 5 Habits of Highly Effective Ponies
episodes.overview: Fluttershy needs help with a shy butterfly.

episodes.name: Game Knight
episodes.overview: Twilight wants her friends to play her game when they are trapped inside due to "bad weather".

episodes.name: Director Spike's Mockumentary
episodes.overview: Spike wants to film his friends.

episodes.name: Whoof-dunnit
episodes.overview: Somepony has lost their hat and there's only one mystery-solver who can help.

episodes.name: Dear Tabby
episodes.overview: After a fight with a friend, Applejack seeks advice from her favourite blogger.

episodes.name: Pie vs. Pie
episodes.overview: Pinkie Pie finds herself in a cupcake contest with her oldest rival, her brother.

episodes.name: Superb Six
episodes.overview: Pinkie and friends try to prepare Snips and Snails for the gala but lose track of the purpose of why they are helping them.

episodes.name: The Debut Taunt
episodes.overview: Rarity's going to be a star and she needs everypony to celebrate.

episodes.name: Flutterdash
episodes.overview: Rainbow Dash needs help from her friends after she's sidelined at the Sportacular Spectacular.

episodes.name: The Rarity Report
episodes.overview: Rarity worries that the Sportacular Spectacular is no place for an indoor pony.

episodes.name: The Great Divide
episodes.overview: The six ponies signed up to the Sportacular Spectacular only to find out their team is not what they expected it to be.

episodes.name: The Great Collide
episodes.overview: Being split into two competing teams, the ponies have to face their best friends.

episodes.name: Sportacular Spectacular Musical Musak-ular
episodes.overview: At the closing ceremonies of the Sportactular Spectacular, the Mane 6 are thrust into the spotlight.

episodes.name: Cute Impact
episodes.overview: Twilight makes a shocking discovery when she sees a strange pink dot through her telescope. But instead of telling her friends, she decides to handle this situation her own.

episodes.name: The Crystal Capturing Contraption
episodes.overview: Fluttershy interviews her friends about the coming Cosmic Cotton Candy Comet, while Pinkie Pie tries to collect the cosmic crystals needed for her treats. But, she needs Fluttershy's help.

episodes.name: The Comet Section
episodes.overview: Rarity decides to throw a viewing party for all of Ponyville to watch the Cosmic Cotton Candy Comet.

episodes.name: Cotton Candy-Colored Glasses
episodes.overview: Rainbow decides to sell merchandise to commemorate the Cosmic Cotton Candy Comet, but unfortunately for her, another pony gets the same idea as her.

episodes.name: Close Encounters of the Balloon Kind
episodes.overview: When a mysterious balloon lands in Ponyville, the Mane Six try to figure out what it is and what it could be.

episodes.name: The Tiara of Truth
episodes.overview: When Pinkie Pie's friends except Rarity are late to a certain cupcake testing, she uses a magical tiara (given to her by Fluttershy) to find out the real reason why they couldn't come.

episodes.name: Terrorarium
episodes.overview: Applejack adopts a magical flower friend as her pet, which winds up growing out of control when he eats the entire apple crop.

episodes.name: Bubble Trouble
episodes.overview: Spike and the Mane Six find a bubble wand and have fun with it. But, things take a turn for the worse pretty quick when they get stuck.

episodes.name: Time After Time Capsule
episodes.overview: When the Mane Six decide to make a time capsule to look back fondly on their time in the future, Fluttershy struggles to find the perfect item to add to it.

episodes.name: The Great Cowgirl Hat Robbery
episodes.overview: Rarity and Applejack get transported to Old Equestria, and have to prove themselves worthy to get Applejack's cowgirl hat back in order to return to their time.

episodes.name: Planet of the Apps
episodes.overview: When Twilight and Rainbow Dash are tranported to a futuristic-looking Ponyville, they have to save Fluttershy from Mecha-Ponies!

episodes.name: Back to the Present
episodes.overview: The Mane Six are reunited and return to their own time, only to discover that Sugarcube Corner is now a salad restaurant.

episodes.name: Magical Mare-story Tour
episodes.overview: After the Wild Siders have crossed over into Ponyville, the Mane Six show them around the town, but nearly miss the tour's point .

episodes.name: Life of Pie
episodes.overview: Lightning Chill watches Pinkie Pie as her baking apprentice for the day, but the two clash over how they like their styles.

episodes.name: The Rarest of Occasions
episodes.overview: Rarity prepares herself for the premiere of her 100th livestream episode of her show, with Sugar Snap’s help.

episodes.name: Portal Combat
episodes.overview: The Mane Six get a mane makeover at Princess Cadence's Mane Styling booth. But when Rarity arrives late, the booth is already closed, and she feels left out and envious.

episodes.name: What Goes Updo
episodes.overview: The Mane Six get a mane makeover at Princess Cadence's Mane Styling booth. But when Rarity arrives late, the booth is already closed, and she feels left out and envious.

episodes.name: Communication Shakedown
episodes.overview: When Pinkie suggests splitting up to do separate things and synchronizing with text messages, the other ponies take her texts the wrong way.

episodes.name: Lolly-Pop
episodes.overview: Fluttershy decides to pursue her childhood dream of being a clown. However, Applejack has a fear of clowns.

episodes.name: Little Miss Fortune
episodes.overview: When a fortune-telling machine makes the ponies' fortunes come true, Rainbow Dash fears that her worst one will happen and decides to join a traveling circus to "stay in motion."

episodes.name: Playwright or Wrong
episodes.overview: The Mane Six decide to celebrate Ponyville Play Day by letting the Wild Siders decide to pitch their ideas on which play they should do.

episodes.name: The Shows Must Go On
episodes.overview: When a theater director casts Rarity in a stage play on the same night The Mane Six's play is on, she must choose between fame or friends.

episodes.name: The De-stress Ball
episodes.overview: Applejack catches stage fright on the night of their play, and her friends try to help her relax, and relieve herself of the stress.

episodes.name: Mad Props
episodes.overview: On the night of the play, the Mane Six's props begin running amok, and they try to go along with it as if it were nothing.

episodes.name: Magic is Ahoof
episodes.overview: The magic in Ponyville has reached its peak, and Rarity and Pinkie Pie have to find out why.

episodes.name: Journey to the Center of the 'cord
episodes.overview: When Discord makes off with their cosmic wishes, the Mane Six decide to go into his head to find out his intentions with them.

episodes.name: One Last Wish
episodes.overview: With chaos magic still around and Ponyville and the Wild Side about to collide, the Mane Six and Wild Siders must team up to set things right.

episodes.name: Wild Hearts Beats
episodes.overview: Continuing from the previous episode, the Mane Six decide to throw Discord his first ever birthday party to get him to use his last wish to save Ponyville.
